pages.text: Hitting things with a heavy, flat surface is a simple task, but a useful one. The Press has two faces that accept rotational power from the side and will pass it through like an encased Shaft.

$(l)Impressive and Impactful$()$(br2)The Press has two modes of operation, depending mainly on what's below it. If the Press's head will drop down to hit a $(o)solid block$() or $(o)Belt$(), the Press will follow $(l)stamping$() recipes. If instead the Press's head will drop into a $(o)Basin$(), the press will $(l)compact$() items.
